welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lisse, the charming city known for its beautiful flower fields and quaint canals. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonders this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for long-haul and intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
